items.name: News Sentiment
items.definition: Average VADER compound sentiment across recent curated headlines.

items.name: Consumer Price Index (CPI)
items.definition: Measures average change over time in prices paid by consumers.

items.name: Nonfarm Payrolls (NFP)
items.definition: Change in the number of employed during the previous month, excluding farming.

items.name: ISM Manufacturing PMI
items.calculation: level vs 50 and vs trailing mean

items.name: Consumer Confidence (Conference Board)
items.definition: Survey-based index of consumer sentiment toward the economy.

items.name: Reddit Sentiment
items.definition: Net sentiment from selected subreddits' titles, time-decayed and weighted.

items.name: Google Trends (Macro Terms)
items.definition: Week-over-week standardized change in search interest for macro terms.
